attributes.action: We request a snap General Election to decide our country's fate.
attributes.additional_details:
There is much evidence that many Leave voters were swayed by a clearly false Leave campaign, others regret their vote saying they only wanted to punish the EU.

This is xenophobic and scaremongering : http://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/b07gr86m/eu-referendum-campaign-broadcasts-vote-leave-14062016

Regrets:  http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/brexit-backers-change-vote-remain-eu-referendum_uk_576d37f9e4b0d25711498bb5
attributes.background: Many people regret the way they voted in the EU referendum and others did not understand the true implications of their vote. We want and need the chance to decide who now governs us. We need the opportunity to vote for an inclusive PM who wants to stay in the EU if a 2nd referendum is not granted.
